keyword: how many calories are in crumbl cookies
title: How Many Calories Are in Crumbl Cookies?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in Crumbl cookies per serving, including macros, nutrition breakdown, and flavor variations for your favorite gourmet treats.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Crumbl Cookies?
assumptions: Average large Crumbl cookie (e.g., chocolate chip with frosting); approximately 120g each; values based on typical flavors as exact nutrition varies by weekly rotation.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, size, ingredients, and bakery preparation. Check Crumbl's official site or packaging for current values.

quick_answer.text: One Crumbl cookie typically contains about 1000 kcal, packed with carbs and sugars from dough and frosting.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in one Crumbl cookie?
faqs.a: Approximately 1000 kcal per large cookie, depending on the flavor.

faqs.q: Do all Crumbl cookies have the same calories?
faqs.a: No, calories range from 800-1200 kcal based on weekly flavors and toppings.

faqs.q: What are the macros in Crumbl cookies?
faqs.a: Typically 140g carbs, 50g fat, 10g protein, with high sugars around 90g.

faqs.q: Are Crumbl cookies high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 500mg sodium per cookie from dough and mix-ins.

faqs.q: How do Crumbl cookies compare to regular cookies?
faqs.a: Much higher at 1000 kcal vs. 200-300 kcal for a standard chocolate chip cookie due to size and richness.
